name: Obsidian to Oblivion
description:
Details:

Created for the Boss Battle Build Bout in the RPG Maker forums:

The Obsidian Dragon comes from beyond the edge of time and space. They exist in all realities and none. And he has finally broken free. Their incarnations have appeared in every dimension! Each incarnation has their own powers, sometimes similar, sometimes wildly different, but they always look the same.

Enter four heroes...

  • Goal:  Defeat Obsidian Dragon
  • 5-10 minutes of gameplay (game is a single battle)

Play Mechanics:

  • UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT to highlight selection
  • ENTER or SPACE to select (or finish dialog boxes)
  • ESC or X for menu (and to leave menu)
  • F4 toggles full screen on/off
